channel.title: Bearshare - File Sharing stuff
channel.description:
[size=7][font=Verdana][font=Verdana][font=Verdana][font=Verdana][font=Verdana]Bearshare [/font][/font][/font][/font][/font][/size]
FIRST OF ALL, I am aware of whoever's list of programs and this is listed there, but this is an individual topic. My comments.
This program is uber amazing, as the premium files have good quality, plus they get neatly sorted. When you first register, you usually have this premium thingy where you can download premium songs for a while. Though it is a complete ripoff of iMesh, this has a better name, it reminds me of Carebears yo!
[center] ▒▒▒▒▒▒▒██▒▒▒▒███▒▒▒▒​██ ▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓█▒██▓▓▓██▒█​▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒█▓▒▒▓█▓▓▓▓▓▓▓█▓​▒▒▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒█▓▒▒▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓​▒▒▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓​▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓​▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓█▓▓▓▓▓▓█▓▓​▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓██▓▓▓▓▓██▓​▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▒▒█▓█▒▒▓▓​▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▒▒▓▒▒███▒▒▓▒​▒▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▒▒▓▒▒▒█▒▒▒▓▒​▒▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓▓▒▒▒▒▒▓▓▓​▓▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓▓███▓▓▓▓​▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓​▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▓▓​▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▓​▓▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓█▓▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▓​█▓▓▓█ ▒▒██▓▓▓█▓▒▒▒██▒██▒▒▒​▓█▓▓▓██ ▒█▓▓▓▓█▓▓▒▒█▓▓█▓▓█▒▒​▓▓█▓▓▓▓█ █▓██▓▓█▓▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓█▒▒​▒▓█▓▓██▓█ █▓▓▓▓█▓▓▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓█▒▒▒​▒▓▓█▓▓▓▓█ ▒█▓▓▓█▓▓▒▒▒▒▒█▓█▒▒▒▒​▒▓▓█▓▓▓█ ▒▒████▓▓▒▒▒▒▒▒█▒▒▒▒▒​▒▓▓████ ▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒​▓▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▓​▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▓▓​▓▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓█▓█▓▓▓▓​▓█ ▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓█▓▓▓▓▓​█ ▒▒▒▒▒████▓▓▓▓▓█▓▓▓▓▓​████ ▒▒▒▒█▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓█▓▓▓▓▓​▓▓▓▓█ [/center]
[size=5]Feature:[/size] -Fast Download Speed (At least the premium) -Premium has good quality -Neatly organized premium songs -Gives you a chance to get extremely good quality music by taking off the Premium DRM.
Website: http://bearshare.com/ Direct Download Link: http://download.bearshare.com/BearShareV7.exe

item.description:

I remember that most searches ended up showing me songs that were only 200-300 kb big. Even LimeWire Pro sucks.
[/quote]
Ye, but it’s common sense that a song is atleast 1mb.
The ones under are adware mostly.[/quote]

Not mostly. Most of the songs > 1mb have a shocking bitrate (32Kbps) and are recorded by some tramp using a phone off the radio

item.title: Bearshare - File Sharing stuff
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote="»rezzy., post:7, topic:273510"]The filesharing sucks, of course if you’re looking for those stuff use Limewire or Frostwire or Torrent and shit
I mainly posted this for the Premium shit, it actually has good quality and the length of the song actually isn’t fucked up.
Most of my songs transition to the next song in the album, so if the length is fucked, I hate it. All torrents I’ve downloaded have had it messed up.
The premium of this got it right, no adware or anything for the premium downloads.

I have no ad ware yet, I’ve been using this for months, and I have no AV or Anti-AD or those shit. I don’t use them.

hapee

EDIT: Editted post to state that the filesharing does indeed suck, but the premium files are pretty good.[/quote]

I used to use Bearshare and I can still remember a bunch of songs that had things like freezing halfway through song, cutting off before the end, etc.
I have never had anything like that happen with torrents.
As a matter of fact, two nights ago I went and deleted all my songs that I had downloaded from BS and got the discographies of all the bands I deleted off of torrents, and it’s perfect.

Read full topic

item.title: Bearshare - File Sharing stuff
item.dc:creator: @_rezzy »rezzy.
item.description:
@_rezzy wrote:

The filesharing sucks, of course if you’re looking for those stuff use Limewire or Frostwire or Torrent and shit
I mainly posted this for the Premium shit, it actually has good quality and the length of the song actually isn’t fucked up.
Most of my songs transition to the next song in the album, so if the length is fucked, I hate it. All torrents I’ve downloaded have had it messed up.
The premium of this got it right, no adware or anything for the premium downloads.

I have no ad ware yet, I’ve been using this for months, and I have no AV or Anti-AD or those shit. I don’t use them.

hapee

EDIT: Editted post to state that the filesharing does indeed suck, but the premium files are pretty good.

Read full topic
